name: BedRock IDE
short_description: A multiple platform IDE built on the BedRock Rich Client Platform. The central concern of BedRock IDE is to support Java, C/C++, Java Enterprise, the BedRock RCP with multiple profiles along with other technologies related to them. Based on NetBeans.
